Uses of Class
models.domain.Activity

  • Packages that use Activity 
    Package Description
    controllers.service  
    models.domain  

    • Uses of Activity in controllers.service

      Methods in controllers.service that return Activity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Activity ActivityService.createActivity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String venue)
      Creates new Activity object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - no other activity exists with the same name
      Activity ActivityService.findActivityByName(java.lang.String name)
      Find an activity by its name
      Methods in controllers.service that return types with arguments of type Activity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Activity> ActivityService.findActivitiesByDate(java.util.Date date)
      Find all activities that have sessions on a given date
      java.util.List<Activity> ActivityService.findAllActivities()
      Finds all activities
      Methods in controllers.service with parameters of type Activity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Membership MembershipService.createMembership(Activity activity, User user)
      Calls createMembership(Activity, User, Date) By default passes current system date
      Membership MembershipService.createMembership(Activity activity, User user, java.util.Date registrationDate)
      Creates new Membership object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - the user cannot be an administrator - this user is not already signed up for this activity - only one tutor can participate in each activity - this activity's sessions must not clash with any sessions of other activities that the user is already registered for
      boolean ActivityService.deleteActivity(Activity activity)
      Deletes a specific activity along with all its individual sessions Prerequisites: - No users must be signed up for this activity (its Membership objects list must be empty)
      boolean ActivityService.deleteActivitySessions(Activity activity)
      Deletes all sessions of a specific activity Prerequisites: - No registers must exist for any of the sessions
      java.util.List<Membership> MembershipService.findAllMembershipsByActivity(Activity activity)
      Finds all memberships for a specific activity
      java.util.List<ActivitySession> ActivityService.findAllSessionsByActivity(Activity activity)
      Find all sessions for a specific activity on any date
      Membership MembershipService.findMembership(Activity activity, User user)
      Find a membership by its key (activity, user)
      boolean ActivityService.updateActivity(Activity activity)
      Updates activity

    • Uses of Activity in models.domain

      Methods in models.domain that return Activity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Activity ActivitySession.getActivity()
      returns the activity this session is part of
      Activity Membership.getActivity()
      returns the activity involved in this membership
      Methods in models.domain with parameters of type Activity

      sets the the activity this session is part of
      void Membership.setActivity(Activity activity)
      sets the activity involved in this membership
